card.title: ITIL® 4 Create, Deliver Support + Exam Bundle + Take2
card.description: The ITIL® 4 Specialist: Create, Deliver & Support (CDS) course helps learners integrate different value streams and activities to create, deliver and support IT-enabled products and services.
card.info: Helps learners integrate different value streams and activities to deliver and support IT-enabled products and services.

card.title: ITIL® 4 High Velocity IT + Exam Bundle
card.description: The ITIL® 4 Specialist: High Velocity IT (HVIT) helps understand how digital enterprises focus on rapid delivery of products and services in high velocity environments to gain maximum value.
card.info: Focuses on rapid delivery and high-velocity environments in digital enterprises.

card.title: ITIL® 4 Direct, Plan and Improve + Exam Bundle + Take2
card.description: The ITIL 4 Direct, Plan Improve (DPI) qualification focuses on the practical skills necessary to create a ‘learning and improving’ IT organization with a strong strategic direction.
card.info: Focuses on creating a learning and improving IT organization with effective strategic direction.

card.title: ITIL® 4 Drive, Support and Validate + Exam Bundle + Take2
card.description: The ITIL® 4 Specialist: Drive Stakeholder Value (DSV) focuses on engagement and interactions between stakeholders, covering concepts such as CX, UX, and journey mapping.
card.info: Covers engagement and interactions between service providers and their customers, users, suppliers, and partners.

card.title: P3O ® Foundation Exam Voucher
card.description: Brings together a set of principles and techniques to help deliver projects or programmes within an organization or department.
card.info: Portfolio, Programme and Project Offices (P3O®) Foundation Certification.

card.title: P3O ® PractitionerExam Voucher
card.description: Demonstrates how to apply and tailor the P3O guidance in a practical context.

card.title: MoP ® Foundation Voucher
card.description: Provides the knowledge required to work as an informed member of a Portfolio Office.

card.title: MoP® Practitioner Portfolio Management Certification Voucher
card.description: Demonstrates an understanding of how to apply and tailor the MoP guidance in a practical context.
card.info: Practitioner level certification for portfolio management.

card.title: MoV® Foundation Value Management Certification
card.description: Helps you understand the MoV guidance and contribute effectively to value management activities.

card.title: MoV® Practitioner Value Management Certification
card.description: Focuses on applying the principles of value management activities in real-life scenarios.

card.title: COBIT® 5 Foundation Voucher
card.description: Incorporates enterprise governance and management techniques with globally accepted principles and practices.

card.title: COBIT® 5 Assessor Voucher
card.description: Provides an end-to-end business view of the governance of enterprise IT.

card.title: COBIT® 5 Implementation Voucher
card.description: Emphasizes the central role of IT in value creation by providing a business view of enterprise IT governance.

card.title: Six Sigma Yellow Belt Voucher from IASSC
card.description: Focuses on breakthrough improvements by managing variation and reducing defects.
card.info: Six Sigma Yellow Belt Certification Voucher.

card.title: Six Sigma Green Belt Voucher from IASSC
card.description: Focuses on breakthrough improvements by managing variation and reducing defects.
card.info: Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Voucher.

card.title: Six Sigma Belt Belt Voucher from IASSC
card.description: Focuses on breakthrough improvements by managing variation and reducing defects.

card.title: Foundation Javascript Exam Voucher
card.description: Aimed at IT professionals seeking a globally recognized Peoplecert Devskills Foundation Javascript Certification.

card.title: Advanced Java Exam Voucher
card.description: Aimed at IT professionals seeking a globally recognized Peoplecert Devskills Advanced Java Certification.

card.title: The ITIL Specialist: Acquiring & Managing Cloud Services
card.description: Provides vendor-neutral, user-centric guidance on how cloud procurement and technology can support business strategy.
card.info: Guidance on acquiring and managing cloud services.

card.title: The ITIL® 4 Sustainability in Digital & IT guidance
card.description: Helps you understand the role of IT and digitally enabled services in relation to the environment and how to positively impact it.
card.info: Sustainability guidance in digital and IT.

card.title: The ITIL 4 Foundation guidance
card.description: Introduces an end-to-end operating model for the creation, delivery, and continual improvement of technology-enabled products and services.

card.title: The ITIL® 4 Specialist: Create, Deliver & support (CDS)
card.description: Helps learners integrate different value streams and activities to create, deliver and support IT-enabled products and services.
card.info: Guidance for creating, delivering, and supporting IT-enabled services.

card.title: ITIL4 Managing Professional Drive Stakeholder Value guidance
card.description: Covers engagement and interaction between service providers and their stakeholders.

card.title: The ITIL® 4 Specialist: High Velocity IT (HVIT)
card.description: Helps understand how digital enterprises focus on rapid delivery of products and services in high velocity environments.
card.info: High Velocity IT guidance for rapid delivery.

card.title: The ITIL 4 Direct, Plan Improve (DPI) qualification
card.description: Focuses on the practical skills necessary to create a ‘learning and improving’ IT organization with a strong strategic direction.
card.info: Guidance for direct, plan, and improve IT processes.

card.title: The ITIL4 Digital & IT strategy
card.description: Provides guidance on ITIL concepts at a corporate strategy level, helping IT and digital leaders drive strategic business decisions.

card.title: PRINCE2® (Projects In Controlled Environments)
card.description: A process-based method providing the essentials for project management and helping organizations successfully deliver new products and services.

card.title: PRINCE2 Agile®
card.description: Combines agile flexibility with the clearly defined framework of PRINCE2®, offering guidance on project delivery in an agile environment.

card.title: The MSP guidance
card.description: Addresses common challenges in leading investments in change, aligning programmes and projects to organizational strategy.

card.title: Management of Risk: Creating and Protecting Value
card.description: Offers a benefits and value-focused approach to risk management with practical guidance across industries and sectors.
card.info: Risk management guidance for creating and protecting value.

card.title: AgileSHIFT
card.description: Helps individuals and organizations create a culture of enterprise-wide agility to drive transformational change.

card.title: P3O® (Portfolio, Programme and Project Offices)
card.description: Provides universally applicable guidance with principles, processes, and techniques for effective portfolio, programme, and project management.
card.info: Guidance on portfolio, programme, and project offices.

card.title: MoV® (Management of Value)
card.description: Provides essential guidance on maximising value and making better use of resources, considering both monetary and non-monetary benefits.

card.title: The Management of Portfolios (MoP®)
card.description: Provides guidance to senior executives and decision-makers on portfolio management principles and how to start and sustain progress.

card.title: Student Guide for SDI's SDA v8
card.description: Helps service desk professionals understand the four key concepts that define the required skills, competencies, and knowledge.
card.info: Student guide for SDI's SDA v8 certification.

questions: Do you provide certifications with your training?
Do you offer certifications with your training?
faqData.answer: Yes, all our courses come with globally recognized certifications upon successful completion. (link of the courses)

questions: Can I get a demo session before enrolling?
faqData.answer: Absolutely! We provide free demo sessions for select courses to help you understand our teaching methods. Contact us to schedule your demo. (contact us link)

questions: What IT training courses do you offer?
faqData.answer: We offer a wide range of IT training courses, including cloud computing, cybersecurity, data analytics, AI/ML, and project management certifications (PMP, Prince2), and more. Visit our website for the full catalog or chat with an expert! (link of the website)

questions: What are the payment options available?
faqData.answer: We accept payments via credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and EMI options for certain courses.

questions: What is your upcoming schedule?
faqData.answer: Link of the schedule page on website

questions: Do you have any ongoing discounts or offers?
faqData.answer: Yes, we have exclusive discounts for early enrollments and group bookings. Chat with our sales team to learn more! (contact us link)

questions: How do I access my course materials?
faqData.answer: Once you enroll in a course, you will receive login credentials to our Learning Management System (LMS), where you can access all course materials, live sessions, and recorded lectures.

questions: Can I reschedule my training sessions?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can reschedule your training sessions based on availability. Please contact our support team for assistance.

questions: Who can I contact for certification exam queries?
faqData.answer: You can reach out to our certification support team at [contact email/phone] for assistance regarding exam registration, scheduling, and other queries.

questions: What if I miss a session?
faqData.answer: If you miss a session, you can access the recorded lecture in your LMS account. If needed, you can also schedule a one-on-one session with the trainer.

questions: How do I get technical support during the training?
faqData.answer: You can contact our technical support team via chat, email, or phone. We also have a dedicated helpdesk available through the LMS.

questions: Please share your WhatsApp/Telegram number.
What is your WhatsApp/Telegram number?
faqData.answer: You can reach us on WhatsApp/Telegram at [insert number]. Alternatively, you can chat with our support team on the website for quick assistance.

questions: What is Ducis Group?
faqData.answer: Ducis Group is a leading provider of IT training, corporate learning solutions, and technology consulting services.

questions: Where is Ducis Group located?
faqData.answer: Our headquarters is at [company address], but we offer online and in-person training.

questions: How long do your courses last?
faqData.answer: Course duration varies based on the program. Short courses can last a few days, while certification programs may take weeks or months.

questions: Do I get lifetime access to course materials?
faqData.answer: Some courses provide lifetime access to materials, while others have limited-time access. Check course details for specifics.

questions: Can I get a refund if I’m not satisfied with a course?
faqData.answer: We have a refund policy in place. Please refer to our terms and conditions or contact support for details.

questions: Do you offer corporate training programs?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide customized corporate training for businesses, tailored to their specific needs.

questions: Can you develop a training program specific to my company’s needs?
faqData.answer: Absolutely! We offer customized learning solutions to meet the unique requirements of your team.

questions: How do I reset my password for the LMS?
faqData.answer: Click on the "Forgot Password" link on the LMS login page and follow the instructions.

questions: How do I provide feedback on a course or trainer?
faqData.answer: You can submit feedback through the LMS or email our support team.

questions: What services does Ducis Group offer?
faqData.answer: Ducis Group specializes in IT training, corporate learning solutions, e-learning platforms, and technology consulting. We provide training for individuals and enterprises in areas like cloud computing, cybersecurity, data analytics, AI/ML, and project management.

questions: Is Ducis Group accredited?
faqData.answer: Yes, our courses and certifications are globally recognized and accredited by industry-leading organizations.

questions: Do you offer training for beginners?
faqData.answer: Yes! We have courses for all levels—beginners, intermediate learners, and advanced professionals.

questions: Is the training online or in-person?
faqData.answer: We offer both online and in-person training, depending on the course. Check the course details for specific availability.

questions: Do you offer job placement assistance?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide career guidance, resume-building sessions, and job placement assistance for select courses.

questions: Can I get a brochure of your courses?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can download our course brochure from our website or request one via email.

questions: How do I choose the right course for me?
faqData.answer: If you’re unsure about which course to take, our course advisors can help. Contact us for a free consultation.

questions: Do you provide hands-on projects?
faqData.answer: Yes, most of our courses include real-world projects and case studies to enhance learning.

questions: Can I enroll in multiple courses at once?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can enroll in multiple courses, and we may offer discounts for bundle enrollments.

questions: Do I need any prior knowledge to enroll in a course?
faqData.answer: Some courses require prerequisites, while others are beginner-friendly. Check the course details for requirements.

questions: Are your courses self-paced or instructor-led?
faqData.answer: We offer both self-paced and instructor-led training programs. You can choose the format that suits you best.

questions: Will I get lifetime access to the course content?
faqData.answer: Some courses provide lifetime access, while others have a limited duration. Check the course details for specific access information.

questions: What are your course fees?
faqData.answer: Our course fees vary based on the program and duration. You can find pricing details on our website or contact our team.

questions: Do you offer installment plans for course fees?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer EMI options for select courses. Contact our support team for details.

questions: Are there any hidden charges?
faqData.answer: No, all fees are mentioned upfront. Any additional costs, such as certification exam fees, will be clearly communicated.

questions: Do you offer corporate discounts?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide discounts for bulk enrollments and corporate training programs.

questions: Can I get an invoice for my payment?
faqData.answer: Yes, an invoice will be sent to your registered email after payment.

questions: What certifications will I receive after completing a course?
faqData.answer: You will receive globally recognized certifications from Ducis Group and, in some cases, from our partner institutions.

questions: Do you provide assistance with certification exams?
faqData.answer: Yes, we guide students through the certification process, including exam registration and preparation.

questions: Can I retake the certification exam if I fail?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can retake the exam. Some certification bodies have waiting periods and retake fees.

questions: How do I access the Learning Management System (LMS)?
faqData.answer: After enrollment, you will receive login credentials via email to access the LMS.

questions: I forgot my LMS password. How can I reset it?
faqData.answer: Click on the "Forgot Password" link on the LMS login page and follow the instructions.

questions: What devices can I use to access the courses?
faqData.answer: You can access the LMS on a laptop, tablet, or smartphone with an internet connection.

questions: Can I download course materials for offline use?
faqData.answer: Some materials are downloadable, while others are available only within the LMS.

questions: Who do I contact for technical issues?
faqData.answer: For technical support, reach out to our helpdesk via email, chat, or phone.

questions: Do you offer training for companies?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide customized corporate training solutions for teams and organizations.

questions: Can Ducis Group develop custom training programs for my company?
faqData.answer: Absolutely! We offer tailored training programs based on your company’s requirements.

questions: Do you provide on-site corporate training?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer both on-site and online corporate training sessions.

questions: Can we integrate your training with our internal LMS?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer API integration and other solutions to integrate our training with your existing LMS.

questions: Do you offer white-label training solutions?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide white-label training solutions that can be branded for your company.

questions: How can I contact your support team?
faqData.answer: You can reach us via chat, email, phone, or WhatsApp.

questions: What are your customer support hours?
faqData.answer: Our support team is available [insert hours] to assist you.

questions: How can I provide feedback on a course or trainer?
faqData.answer: You can submit feedback through the LMS or email our support team.

questions: How do I unsubscribe from marketing emails?
faqData.answer: You can unsubscribe by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link in any marketing email or by contacting support.

questions: What is the mode of instruction for live classes?
faqData.answer: Our live classes are conducted via interactive virtual classrooms, where students can ask questions, participate in discussions, and access hands-on labs.

questions: Will I get a course completion certificate even if I don’t pass the exam?
faqData.answer: Yes, you will receive a course completion certificate, but certification from an external body (if applicable) may require passing an exam.

questions: What is the maximum number of students per batch?
faqData.answer: We keep our batch sizes small to ensure personalized attention. Typically, classes have 10-25 students depending on the course.

questions: Can I interact with trainers during the session?
faqData.answer: Yes, our instructor-led sessions are interactive, and you can ask questions in real time.

questions: Will I have access to trainers after the course ends?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer post-course support through Q&A sessions, discussion forums, and mentorship programs.

questions: Do I need to install any software before starting my course?
faqData.answer: Some courses require specific software, which will be mentioned in the course details. Our team can assist with installation guidance.

questions: What languages are your courses available in?
faqData.answer: Most of our courses are in English, but we offer training in other languages upon request.

questions: How do I enroll in a course?
faqData.answer: You can enroll directly on our website by selecting your course, filling out the registration form, and making the payment.

questions: Do I need to create an account to enroll?
faqData.answer: Yes, you need to create an account to manage your courses, payments, and certifications.

questions: Can I transfer my enrollment to another person?
faqData.answer: Yes, enrollment transfers are allowed before the course starts. Contact support for assistance.

questions: Do you offer trial access to any courses?
faqData.answer: Yes, some of our courses offer free trial access or demo sessions.

questions: Can I upgrade from a self-paced course to a live instructor-led course?
faqData.answer: Yes, upgrades are possible for select courses. Contact us for details on the upgrade process.

questions: How do I cancel my enrollment?
faqData.answer: You can request cancellation by contacting our support team. Refund policies apply as per our terms & conditions.

questions: Are your certifications recognized globally?
faqData.answer: Yes, our certifications are internationally recognized and valued by employers worldwide.

questions: How will I receive my certificate?
faqData.answer: Certificates are available in digital format and can be downloaded from the LMS. Hard copies are available on request.

questions: Can I verify a certification issued by Ducis Group?
faqData.answer: Yes, employers and institutions can verify certifications through our online verification portal.

questions: Do your courses help with industry certification exams?
faqData.answer: Yes, our courses are designed to help you prepare for industry-recognized certifications like AWS, PMP, Cisco, Microsoft, CompTIA, and more.

questions: How can my company partner with Ducis Group for training?
faqData.answer: We offer partnerships for corporate training, content licensing, and white-label solutions. Contact our business team for collaboration opportunities.

questions: Can our employees take courses at their own pace?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer self-paced corporate training that employees can complete at their convenience.

questions: Can you provide training reports for corporate clients?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide detailed analytics and progress reports for corporate training programs.

questions: Do you offer onsite workshops for companies?
faqData.answer: Yes, we conduct onsite workshops and boot camps based on corporate requirements.

questions: What industries do you cater to for corporate training?
faqData.answer: We serve multiple industries, including IT, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, and retail.

questions: How do I report a technical issue with the website?
faqData.answer: You can report issues via our support chat, email, or helpline.

questions: I didn’t receive my login details. What should I do?
faqData.answer: Check your spam folder or contact our support team for assistance.

questions: My video lectures are not loading. How can I fix this?
faqData.answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing your cache, or switching to a different browser. If the issue persists, contact support.

questions: Do you offer mobile apps for course access?
faqData.answer: Yes, our LMS has a mobile app for easy access to courses on the go.

questions: Is my personal information secure with Ducis Group?
faqData.answer: Yes, we use secure encryption and strict privacy policies to protect your data.

questions: Do you offer loyalty rewards for returning customers?
faqData.answer: Yes! We have exclusive discounts and referral bonuses for repeat customers.

questions: Can I get a discount if I refer a friend?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer a referral program where you can earn discounts or cash rewards.

questions: Do you have any student discounts?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer special discounts for students with valid ID proof.

questions: Are there seasonal sales or promotions on courses?
faqData.answer: Yes, we run holiday and seasonal promotions with limited-time discounts.

questions: Do you offer training for freelancers?
faqData.answer: Yes, we have courses designed for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and remote workers.

questions: Can I add my certification to LinkedIn?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can add our certification to your LinkedIn profile to boost your professional credentials.

questions: Do you offer internships or work opportunities?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer internship and project-based opportunities for select courses.

questions: Can I use my course certificate to apply for jobs?
faqData.answer: Absolutely! Our certificates are recognized by many employers worldwide.

questions: Will I get soft skills or resume training?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide additional career guidance, resume writing, and interview preparation sessions.

questions: What happens if a course is canceled?
faqData.answer: If we cancel a course due to unforeseen circumstances, you will receive a full refund or the option to enroll in another batch.

questions: Do you offer weekend or evening batches for working professionals?
faqData.answer: Yes, we have weekend and evening classes to accommodate working professionals.

questions: What happens if the instructor changes mid-course?
faqData.answer: If an instructor change is necessary, we ensure a seamless transition without impacting course quality.

questions: Can I get private tutoring sessions?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer one-on-one mentorship and tutoring for certain courses.

questions: Do you provide course materials in multiple formats (PDF, video, etc.)?
faqData.answer: Yes, course materials are available in PDFs, videos, slides, and case studies.

questions: How do I download course materials?
faqData.answer: You can download them from the LMS dashboard, where permitted.

questions: Can I switch from an instructor-led class to a self-paced course?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can switch formats if needed. Contact support for details.

questions: Can I pay in a different currency?
faqData.answer: Yes, we accept multiple currencies through secure payment gateways.

questions: Do you offer financial aid or scholarships?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer scholarships and financial aid for deserving candidates. Apply through our scholarship portal.

questions: Can I request an installment plan after enrolling?
faqData.answer: Yes, installment plans are available before and after enrollment for select courses.

questions: What is your refund policy?
faqData.answer: Refunds are processed based on our terms and conditions. Check our refund policy page for details.

questions: How long does it take to process a refund?
faqData.answer: Refunds typically take 5-7 business days, depending on your payment method.

questions: Do you offer industry-specific training (finance, healthcare, etc.)?
faqData.answer: Yes, we have specialized courses for finance, healthcare, IT, and other industries.

questions: Can you help with skill development for career changers?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer career guidance for professionals transitioning into tech or other industries.

questions: Do your courses meet corporate compliance training requirements?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer courses that align with corporate compliance standards.

questions: Do you offer training in digital marketing, UI/UX, or product management?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide courses in digital marketing, UI/UX design, product management, and more.

questions: Do you have courses on emerging technologies (AI, blockchain, etc.)?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer courses in AI, blockchain, IoT, quantum computing, and other cutting-edge fields.

questions: Can I network with other learners?
faqData.answer: Yes, we have community forums, LinkedIn groups, and networking events.

questions: Do you provide access to job postings?
faqData.answer: Yes, enrolled students get access to exclusive job listings and recruiter networks.

questions: Is there an alumni program?
faqData.answer: Yes, we offer an alumni network with continued learning and career support.

questions: Can I become a mentor for new learners?
faqData.answer: Yes, experienced learners can apply for our peer mentorship program.

questions: Do you have guest lectures from industry experts?
faqData.answer: Yes, we regularly host guest sessions with industry leaders.

questions: Do you support screen readers and accessibility tools?
faqData.answer: Yes, our platform is designed for accessibility, including screen reader support.

questions: Can I integrate my LMS progress with LinkedIn Learning or Udemy?
faqData.answer: Currently, we do not support direct integration, but you can showcase your certifications on LinkedIn.

questions: Do you support AI-based learning recommendations?
faqData.answer: Yes, our LMS suggests courses based on your learning patterns and career goals.

questions: Can I request a feature update for the LMS?
faqData.answer: Yes, we welcome suggestions for improving the platform. Contact our support team with your ideas.

questions: How do you ensure compliance with GDPR and data privacy laws?
faqData.answer: We follow strict data protection policies and comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other global standards.

questions: Can I delete my account and personal data?
faqData.answer: Yes, you can request account deletion through our support team.

questions: Are my payment details stored securely?
faqData.answer: Yes, all payments are processed through secure, PCI-compliant gateways.

questions: Do you share my personal data with third parties?
faqData.answer: No, we do not sell or share your personal data with third parties without your consent.
